EmailTemplate.name: DF Confirmation of Request Submitted HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for submitting your request to get your Community recognised as Dementia Friendly
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!DFC_Community__c.OwnerFullName}
Your request to get {!DFC_Community__c.Name__c} recognised as a Dementia Friendly Community has been submitted with reference {!DFC_Community__c.Name}.
We will email you when your request has been reviewed so you can start recording your activity to work towards full recognition. We will respond within 14 working days.
Many thanks,
The Dementia Friendly Communities Team
